CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Starfall Mart?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {below} Starfall Mart in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Exchange relative to Crimson Bazaar?
SRP.A: Nova Exchange is {above} Crimson Bazaar in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Aether Market?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {above} Aether Market in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Market}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Bazaar}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Trade's maximum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Trade's maximum Price Index is in {2012}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Market's minimum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Market's minimum Price Index is in {1996}.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1996 higher or lower than in 2011?
NC.A: The total price index in 1996 was {lower} than in 2011.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2010, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 2000 and 2009?
NC.A: The change in total price index between 2000 and 2010 was {larger} than between 2000 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2009, was the average total Price Index higher or lower than between 1997 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total price index between 2000 and 2009 was {higher} than between 1997 and 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1999 higher or lower than in 2002?
NC.A: The total price index in 1999 was {lower} than in 2002.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Market} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aether Market and Ironwood Market first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aether Market and Ironwood Market first exchanged leading positions in {1998}.
